brainly_data.question:
Which of the following technologies is now being used to do many of the things that Adobe Flash was once used for? 
Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)
Server Side Programming Languages
advanced HTML and JavaScript
HTML design templates
brainly_data.subject: Computers and technology

all_answers.question:

Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)

all_answers.subject: Computers and technology
all_answers.text: I think it is the advanced HTML and JavaScript
